{{cpp/chrono/month_weekday_last/title|month|weekday_last}}
{{cpp/chrono/month_weekday_last/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|num=1|1=
constexpr std::chrono::month month() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|num=2|1=
constexpr std::chrono::weekday_last weekday_last() const noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Retrieves a copy of the {{ltt|cpp/chrono/month}} and {{ltt|cpp/chrono/weekday_last}} objects stored in {{c|*this}}.

===Return value===
@1@ A copy of the {{lc|std::chrono::month}} object stored in {{c|*this}}.
@2@ A copy of the {{lc|std::chrono::weekday_last}} object stored in {{c|*this}}.

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;chrono&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
using namespace std::chrono;
 
int main()
{
    std::cout &lt;&lt; std::boolalpha;

    auto mwdl{March/Friday[last]}; // Last Friday in a March
    auto ywdl{year(2024)/mwdl};
    std::cout &lt;&lt; (year_month_day{ywdl} == 
                  year_month_day{March/29/2024}) &lt;&lt; ' ';
    // Last Friday of the next month, in 2024
    mwdl = {(mwdl.month() + months(1))/mwdl.weekday_last()};
    ywdl = {year(2024)/mwdl}; 
    std::cout &lt;&lt; (year_month_day{ywdl} == 
                  year_month_day{April/26/2024}) &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|output=
true true
}}
